Get ready, Trainers. Something big is coming to IIT Bombay Techfest.
Are you prepared for the adventure? Let us know in the comments.

Paraflow = PM logic × Designer taste → dev-ready code

Try Free Now

IIT Bombay, are you ready?
Pokémon GO is coming to Techfest 2025!
Swipe through for wild spawns, bonuses, and everything you need to plan your adventure.
 December 22-24, 2025 | Indian Institute of Technology, Powai, Mumbai 400 076


https://
pokemongo.com/en/post/pokemo
ngoattechfest2025

Trainers, assemble!

This December, Pokémon GO takes over IIT Bombay to power up Techfest 2025 with the spirit of exploration and adventure.

Your journey. Your team. Your moment. 
 Step into the Catch Cup and prove your skill with your Pokémon by your side! Only Pokémon caught in the last two days are eligible!

The arena at IIT Techfest 2025 is ready... are you? 
 Swipe for mandatory rules and registration

#TakaraTomyArts is planning to release "Pokémon Flocky Dolls" in late December.ᐟ
These are soothing figures with a fluffy texture 
The lineup includes all 4 types: Pikachu (female form), Chimchar, Sylveon, and Pachirisu

A new Japanese Pokémon merchandise line has been revealed with a theme of a Pokémon supermarket. The designs used for the pouches, keychains, etc. are fake products like Arboliva olive oil, Machoke protein powder, Alcremie cream, Solosis gummies, Rotom Wash detergent, and more.

There’s a lot of recent commotion related to this small fossil Pokémon. A lot of that excitement is due to the value of this card going up drastically.
 
But, card value is only one part of collecting. Let’s look at some other items to appreciate while Pokémon card collecting
